classes.name: Util
classes.comment: Series of utility classes to perform various operations.

methods.name: getAddr
methods.comment: Method to transform human readable addresses into usable address objects.

methods.name: hex
methods.comment: Formats an integer as a hex value.

methods.name: exception
methods.comment:
Constructs a pretty one line version of a {@link Throwable}. Useful for
 debugging.

methods.name: getUUID
methods.comment: Converts a String to a UUID

classes.name: PendingConnection
classes.comment: Represents a user attempting to log into the proxy.

methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Get the requested username.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.comment: Get the numerical client version of the player attempting to log in.

methods.name: getVirtualHost
methods.comment: Get the requested virtual host that the client tried to connect to.

methods.name: getListener
methods.comment: Get the listener that accepted this connection.

methods.name: getUUID
methods.comment: Get this connection's UUID, if set.

methods.name: getUniqueId
methods.comment: Get this connection's UUID, if set.

methods.name: setUniqueId
methods.comment: Set the connection's uuid

methods.name: isOnlineMode
methods.comment:
Get this connection's online mode.
See {@link #setOnlineMode(boolean)} for a description of how this option works.

methods.name: setOnlineMode
methods.comment:
Set this connection's online mode.
May be called only during the PlayerHandshakeEvent to set the online mode configuration setting for this connection only (i.e. whether or not the client will be treated as if it is connecting to an online mode server).

methods.name: isLegacy
methods.comment:
Check if the client is using the older unsupported Minecraft protocol
 used by Minecraft clients older than 1.7.

classes.name: ProxiedPlayer
classes.comment:
Represents a player who's connection is being connected to somewhere else,
 whether it be a remote or embedded server.

methods.name: getDisplayName
methods.comment: Gets this player's display name.

methods.name: setDisplayName
methods.comment:
Sets this players display name to be used as their nametag and tab list
 name.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.comment: Send a message to the specified screen position of this player.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.comment: Send a message to the specified screen position of this player.

methods.name: connect
methods.comment:
Connects / transfers this user to the specified connection, gracefully
 closing the current one. Depending on the implementation, this method
 might return before the user has been connected.

methods.name: connect
methods.comment:
Connects / transfers this user to the specified connection, gracefully
 closing the current one. Depending on the implementation, this method
 might return before the user has been connected.

methods.name: connect
methods.comment:
Connects / transfers this user to the specified connection, gracefully
 closing the current one. Depending on the implementation, this method
 might return before the user has been connected.

methods.name: connect
methods.comment:
Connects / transfers this user to the specified connection, gracefully
 closing the current one. Depending on the implementation, this method
 might return before the user has been connected.

methods.name: connect
methods.comment:
Connects / transfers this user to the specified connection, gracefully
 closing the current one. Depending on the implementation, this method
 might return before the user has been connected.

methods.name: getServer
methods.comment: Gets the server this player is connected to.

methods.name: getPing
methods.comment: Gets the ping time between the proxy and this connection.

methods.name: sendData
methods.comment:
Send a plugin message to this player.

 In recent Minecraft versions channel names must contain a colon separator
 and consist of [a-z0-9/._-]. This will be enforced in a future version.
 The "BungeeCord" channel is an exception and may only take this form.

methods.name: getPendingConnection
methods.comment: Get the pending connection that belongs to this player.

methods.name: chat
methods.comment: Make this player chat (say something), to the server he is currently on.

methods.name: getReconnectServer
methods.comment: Get the server which this player will be sent to next time the log in.

methods.name: setReconnectServer
methods.comment: Set the server which this player will be sent to next time the log in.

methods.name: getUUID
methods.comment: Get this connection's UUID, if set.

methods.name: getUniqueId
methods.comment: Get this connection's UUID, if set.

methods.name: getLocale
methods.comment: Gets this player's locale.

methods.name: getViewDistance
methods.comment: Gets this player's view distance.

methods.name: getChatMode
methods.comment: Gets this player's chat mode.

methods.name: hasChatColors
methods.comment: Gets if this player has chat colors enabled or disabled.

methods.name: getSkinParts
methods.comment: Gets this player's skin settings.

methods.name: getMainHand
methods.comment: Gets this player's main hand setting.

methods.name: setTabHeader
methods.comment: Set the header and footer displayed in the tab player list.

methods.name: setTabHeader
methods.comment: Set the header and footer displayed in the tab player list.

methods.name: resetTabHeader
methods.comment: Clears the header and footer displayed in the tab player list.

methods.name: sendTitle
methods.comment:
Sends a {@link Title} to this player. This is the same as calling
 {@link Title#send(ProxiedPlayer)}.

methods.name: isForgeUser
methods.comment:
Gets whether this player is using a FML client.

This method is only reliable if BungeeCord links Minecraft 1.8 servers together, as Bungee can pick up whether a user is a Forge user with the initial handshake. If this is used for a 1.7 network, this might return false even if the user is a FML user, as Bungee can only determine this information if a handshake successfully completes.

methods.name: getModList
methods.comment:
Gets this player's Forge Mod List, if the player has sent this information during the lifetime of their connection to Bungee. There is no guarantee that information is available at any time, as it is only sent during a FML handshake. Therefore, this will only contain information for a user that has attempted joined a Forge server.

Consumers of this API should be aware that an empty mod list does not indicate that a user is not a Forge user, and so should not use this API to check for this. See the {@link #isForgeUser() isForgeUser} method instead.

Calling this when handling a {@link net.md_5.bungee.api.event.ServerConnectedEvent} may be the best place to do so as this event occurs after a FML handshake has completed, if any has occurred.

methods.name: getScoreboard
methods.comment: Get the {@link Scoreboard} that belongs to this player.

classes.name: ProxiedPlayer.ChatMode
classes.comment: Represents the player's chat state.

classes.name: Connection
classes.comment:
A proxy connection is defined as a connection directly connected to a socket.
 It should expose information about the remote peer, however not be specific
 to a type of connection, whether server or player.

methods.name: getAddress
methods.comment: Gets the remote address of this connection.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.comment:
Disconnects this end of the connection for the specified reason. If this
 is an {@link ProxiedPlayer} the respective server connection will be
 closed too.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.comment:
Disconnects this end of the connection for the specified reason. If this
 is an {@link ProxiedPlayer} the respective server connection will be
 closed too.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.comment:
Disconnects this end of the connection for the specified reason. If this
 is an {@link ProxiedPlayer} the respective server connection will be
 closed too.

methods.name: isConnected
methods.comment:
Gets whether this connection is currently open, ie: not disconnected, and
 able to send / receive data.

methods.name: unsafe
methods.comment: Get the unsafe methods of this class.

methods.name: sendPacket
methods.comment: Send a packet to this connection.

classes.name: ConnectedPlayer
classes.comment: Represents a player physically connected to the world hosted on this server.

classes.name: Server
classes.comment: Represents a destination which this proxy might connect to.

methods.name: getInfo
methods.comment: Returns the basic information about this server.

methods.name: sendData
methods.comment:
Send data by any available means to this server.

 In recent Minecraft versions channel names must contain a colon separator
 and consist of [a-z0-9/._-]. This will be enforced in a future version.
 The "BungeeCord" channel is an exception and may only take this form.

classes.name: ProxyConfig
classes.comment: Core configuration adaptor for the proxy api.

methods.name: getTimeout
methods.comment: Time before users are disconnected due to no network activity.

methods.name: getUuid
methods.comment: UUID used for metrics.

methods.name: getListeners
methods.comment: Set of all listeners.

methods.name: getServers
methods.comment: Set of all servers.

methods.name: isOnlineMode
methods.comment: Does the server authenticate with mojang

methods.name: isLogCommands
methods.comment: Whether proxy commands are logged to the proxy log

methods.name: getPlayerLimit
methods.comment: Returns the player max.

methods.name: getDisabledCommands
methods.comment: A collection of disabled commands.

methods.name: getThrottle
methods.comment: The connection throttle delay.

methods.name: isIpForward
methods.comment: Whether the proxy will parse IPs with spigot or not

methods.name: getFavicon
methods.comment: The encoded favicon.

methods.name: getFaviconObject
methods.comment: The favicon used for the server ping list.

methods.name: setInstance
methods.comment:
Sets the proxy instance. This method may only be called once per an
 application.

methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Gets the name of the currently running proxy software.

methods.name: getVersion
methods.comment: Gets the version of the currently running proxy software.

methods.name: getTranslation
methods.comment: Gets a localized string from the .properties file.

methods.name: getLogger
methods.comment:
Gets the main logger which can be used as a suitable replacement for
 {@link System#out} and {@link System#err}.

methods.name: getPlayers
methods.comment: Return all players currently connected.

methods.name: getPlayer
methods.comment: Gets a connected player via their unique username.

methods.name: getPlayer
methods.comment: Gets a connected player via their UUID

methods.name: getServers
methods.comment:
Return all servers registered to this proxy, keyed by name. Unlike the
 methods in {@link ConfigurationAdapter#getServers()}, this will not
 return a fresh map each time.

methods.name: getServerInfo
methods.comment: Gets the server info of a server.

methods.name: getPluginManager
methods.comment:
Get the {@link PluginManager} associated with loading plugins and
 dispatching events. It is recommended that implementations use the
 provided PluginManager class.

methods.name: getConfigurationAdapter
methods.comment: Returns the currently in use configuration adapter.

methods.name: setConfigurationAdapter
methods.comment:
Set the configuration adapter to be used. Must be called from
 {@link Plugin#onLoad()}.

methods.name: getReconnectHandler
methods.comment: Get the currently in use reconnect handler.

methods.name: setReconnectHandler
methods.comment: Sets the reconnect handler to be used for subsequent connections.

methods.name: stop
methods.comment: Gracefully mark this instance for shutdown.

methods.name: stop
methods.comment: Gracefully mark this instance for shutdown.

methods.name: registerChannel
methods.comment:
Register a channel for use with plugin messages. This is required by some
 server / client implementations.

methods.name: unregisterChannel
methods.comment: Unregister a previously registered channel.

methods.name: getChannels
methods.comment: Get an immutable set of all registered plugin channels.

methods.name: getGameVersion
methods.comment: Get the Minecraft version supported by this proxy.

methods.name: getProtocolVersion
methods.comment: Get the Minecraft protocol version supported by this proxy.

methods.name: constructServerInfo
methods.comment:
Factory method to construct an implementation specific server info
 instance.

methods.name: getConsole
methods.comment:
Returns the console overlord for this proxy. Being the console, this
 command server cannot have permissions or groups, and will be able to
 execute anything.

methods.name: getPluginsFolder
methods.comment: Return the folder used to load plugins from.

methods.name: getScheduler
methods.comment: Get the scheduler instance for this proxy.

methods.name: getOnlineCount
methods.comment:
Get the current number of connected users. The default implementation is
 more efficient than {@link #getPlayers()} as it does not take a lock or
 make a copy.

methods.name: broadcast
methods.comment: Send the specified message to the console and all connected players.

methods.name: broadcast
methods.comment: Send the specified message to the console and all connected players.

methods.name: broadcast
methods.comment: Send the specified message to the console and all connected players.

methods.name: getDisabledCommands
methods.comment: Gets the commands which are disabled and will not be run on this proxy.

methods.name: getConfig
methods.comment: Gets BungeeCord's core config.

methods.name: matchPlayer
methods.comment:
Attempts to match any players with the given name, and returns a list of
 all possible matches.

 The exact algorithm to use to match players is implementation specific,
 but in general you can expect this method to return player's whose names
 begin with the specified prefix.

methods.name: createTitle
methods.comment:
Creates a new empty title configuration. In most cases you will want to
 {@link Title#reset()} the current title first so your title won't be
 affected by a previous one.

classes.name: ServerPing
classes.comment:
Represents the standard list data returned by opening a server in the
 Minecraft client server list, or hitting it with a packet 0xFE.

classes.name: SkinConfiguration
classes.comment:
Represents a player's skin settings. These settings can be changed by the
 player under Skin Configuration in the Options menu.

classes.name: ServerConnectRequest
classes.comment: A request to connect a server.

classes.name: ServerConnectRequest.Result
classes.comment: The result from this callback after request has been executed by proxy.

classes.name: ServerConnectRequest.Builder
classes.comment:
Class that sets default properties/adds methods to the lombok builder
 generated class.

methods.name: getServer
methods.comment: Gets the initial server name for a connecting player.

methods.name: setServer
methods.comment:
Save the server of this player before they disconnect so it can be
 retrieved later.

methods.name: save
methods.comment:
Save all pending reconnect locations. Whilst not used for database
 connections, this method will be called at a predefined interval to allow
 the saving of reconnect files.

methods.name: close
methods.comment:
Close all connections indicating that the proxy is about to shutdown and
 all data should be saved. No new requests will be made after this method
 has been called.

methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Get the unique name of this command sender.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.comment: Send a message to this sender.

methods.name: sendMessages
methods.comment:
Send several messages to this sender. Each message will be sent
 separately.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.comment: Send a message to this sender.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.comment: Send a message to this sender.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.comment:
Get all groups this user is part of. This returns an unmodifiable
 collection.

methods.name: addGroups
methods.comment: Adds groups to a this user for the current session only.

methods.name: removeGroups
methods.comment: Remove groups from this user for the current session only.

methods.name: hasPermission
methods.comment: Checks if this user has the specified permission node.

methods.name: setPermission
methods.comment: Set a permission node for this user.

methods.name: getPermissions
methods.comment: Get all Permissions which this CommandSender has

classes.name: Title
classes.comment:
Represents a configuration of a title. A title in Minecraft consists of a main title and a sub title. It will {@link #fadeIn(int)}, {@link #stay(int)}, and {@link #fadeOut(int)} for a specified amount of time. In most cases you will want to {@link #reset()} the current title first so your title won't be affected by a previous one.

You can create a new configuration by calling {@link ProxyServer#createTitle()}.

methods.name: title
methods.comment: Set the title to send to the player.

methods.name: title
methods.comment: Set the title to send to the player.

methods.name: subTitle
methods.comment: Set the subtitle to send to the player.

methods.name: subTitle
methods.comment: Set the subtitle to send to the player.

methods.name: fadeIn
methods.comment:
Set the duration in ticks of the fade in effect of the title. Once this
 period of time is over the title will stay for the amount of time
 specified in {@link #stay(int)}. The default value for the official
 Minecraft version is 20 (1 second).

methods.name: stay
methods.comment:
Set the duration in ticks how long the title should stay on the screen.
 Once this period of time is over the title will fade out using the
 duration specified in {@link #fadeOut(int)}. The default value for the
 official Minecraft version is 60 (3 seconds).

methods.name: fadeOut
methods.comment:
Set the duration in ticks of the fade out effect of the title. The
 default value for the official Minecraft version is 20 (1 second).

methods.name: clear
methods.comment:
Remove the currently displayed title from the player's screen. This will
 keep the currently used display times and will only remove the title.

methods.name: reset
methods.comment:
Remove the currently displayed title from the player's screen and set the
 configuration back to the default values.

methods.name: send
methods.comment:
Send this title configuration to the specified player. This is the same
 as calling {@link ProxiedPlayer#sendTitle(Title)}.

classes.name: Favicon
classes.comment: Favicon shown in the server list.

methods.name: create
methods.comment: Creates a favicon from an image.

methods.name: create
methods.comment: Creates a Favicon from an encoded PNG.

classes.name: Callback
classes.comment:
Represents a method which may be called once a result has been computed
 asynchronously.

methods.name: done
methods.comment: Called when the result is done.

classes.name: Cancellable
classes.comment:
Events that implement this indicate that they may be cancelled and thus
 prevented from happening.

methods.name: isCancelled
methods.comment: Get whether or not this event is cancelled.

methods.name: setCancelled
methods.comment: Sets the cancelled state of this event.

classes.name: Listener
classes.comment: Dummy interface which all event subscribers and listeners must implement.

classes.name: Command
classes.comment: A command that can be executed by a {@link CommandSender}.

constructors.name: Command
constructors.comment: Construct a new command with no permissions or aliases.

methods.name: execute
methods.comment: Execute this command with the specified sender and arguments.

methods.name: hasPermission
methods.comment: Check if this command can be executed by the given sender.

classes.name: PluginManager
classes.comment:
Class to manage bridging between plugin duties and implementation duties, for
 example event handling and plugin management.

methods.name: registerCommand
methods.comment: Register a command so that it may be executed.

methods.name: unregisterCommand
methods.comment: Unregister a command so it will no longer be executed.

methods.name: unregisterCommands
methods.comment: Unregister all commands owned by a {@link Plugin}

methods.name: isExecutableCommand
methods.comment:
Checks if the command is registered and can possibly be executed by the
 sender (without taking permissions into account).

methods.name: dispatchCommand
methods.comment: Execute a command if it is registered, else return false.

methods.name: getPlugins
methods.comment: Returns the {@link Plugin} objects corresponding to all loaded plugins.

methods.name: getPlugin
methods.comment: Returns a loaded plugin identified by the specified name.

methods.name: detectPlugins
methods.comment: Load all plugins from the specified folder.

methods.name: callEvent
methods.comment:
Dispatch an event to all subscribed listeners and return the event once
 it has been handled by these listeners.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.comment:
Register a {@link Listener} for receiving called events. Methods in this
 Object which wish to receive events must be annotated with the
 {@link EventHandler} annotation.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.comment: Unregister a {@link Listener} so that the events do not reach it anymore.

methods.name: unregisterListeners
methods.comment: Unregister all of a Plugin's listener.

methods.name: getCommands
methods.comment: Get an unmodifiable collection of all registered commands.

classes.name: Event
classes.comment: Dummy class which all callable events must extend.

methods.name: postCall
methods.comment: Method called after this event has been dispatched to all handlers.

classes.name: Plugin
classes.comment:
Represents any Plugin that may be loaded at runtime to enhance existing
 functionality.

methods.name: onLoad
methods.comment:
Called when the plugin has just been loaded. Most of the proxy will not
 be initialized, so only use it for registering
 {@link ConfigurationAdapter}'s and other predefined behavior.

methods.name: onEnable
methods.comment: Called when this plugin is enabled.

methods.name: onDisable
methods.comment: Called when this plugin is disabled.

methods.name: getDataFolder
methods.comment:
Gets the data folder where this plugin may store arbitrary data. It will
 be a child of {@link ProxyServer#getPluginsFolder()}.

methods.name: getResourceAsStream
methods.comment:
Get a resource from within this plugins jar or container. Care must be
 taken to close the returned stream.

classes.name: PluginDescription
classes.comment: POJO representing the plugin.yml file.

classes.name: ScheduledTask
classes.comment: Represents a task scheduled for execution by the {@link TaskScheduler}.

methods.name: getId
methods.comment: Gets the unique ID of this task.

methods.name: getOwner
methods.comment: Return the plugin which scheduled this task for execution.

methods.name: getTask
methods.comment: Get the actual method which will be executed by this task.

methods.name: cancel
methods.comment: Cancel this task to suppress subsequent executions.

classes.name: TaskScheduler
classes.comment:
This interface represents a scheduler which may be used to queue, delay and
 execute tasks in an asynchronous fashion.

methods.name: cancel
methods.comment:
Cancel a task to prevent it from executing, or if its a repeating task,
 prevent its further execution.

methods.name: cancel
methods.comment:
Cancel a task to prevent it from executing, or if its a repeating task,
 prevent its further execution.

methods.name: cancel
methods.comment:
Cancel all tasks owned by this plugin, this preventing them from being
 executed hereon in.

methods.name: runAsync
methods.comment:
Schedule a task to be executed asynchronously. The task will commence
 running as soon as this method returns.

methods.name: schedule
methods.comment:
Schedules a task to be executed asynchronously after the specified delay
 is up.

methods.name: schedule
methods.comment:
Schedules a task to be executed asynchronously after the specified delay
 is up. The scheduled task will continue running at the specified
 interval. The interval will not begin to count down until the last task
 invocation is complete.

methods.name: unsafe
methods.comment: Get the unsafe methods of this class.

methods.name: getExecutorService
methods.comment: An executor service which underlies this scheduler.

classes.name: Score
classes.comment: Represents a scoreboard score entry.

classes.name: Objective
classes.comment: Represents an objective entry.

classes.name: Position
classes.comment: Represents locations for a scoreboard to be displayed.

classes.name: ConfigurationAdapter
classes.comment:
This class allows plugins to set their own configuration adapter to load
 settings from a different place.

methods.name: load
methods.comment:
Reload all the possible values, and if necessary cache them for
 individual getting.

methods.name: getInt
methods.comment: Gets an integer from the specified path.

methods.name: getString
methods.comment: Gets a string from the specified path.

methods.name: getBoolean
methods.comment: Gets a boolean from the specified path.

methods.name: getList
methods.comment: Get a list from the specified path.

methods.name: getServers
methods.comment: Get the configuration all servers which may be accessible via the proxy.

methods.name: getListeners
methods.comment: Get information about all hosts to bind the proxy to.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.comment: Get all groups this player is in.

methods.name: getPermissions
methods.comment:
Get all permission corresponding to the specified group. The result of
 this method may or may not be cached, depending on the implementation.

classes.name: ListenerInfo
classes.comment:
Class representing the configuration of a server listener. Used for allowing
 multiple listeners on different ports.

constructors.name: ListenerInfo
constructors.signature: (java.net.InetSocketAddress, java.lang.String, int, int, java.util.List<java.lang.String>, boolean, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String>, java.lang.String, boolean, boolean, int, boolean)
constructors.flatSignature: (InetSocketAddress, String, int, int, List<String>, boolean, Map<String, String>, String, boolean, boolean, int, boolean)

methods.name: getDefaultServer
methods.comment: Gets the highest priority server to join.

methods.name: getFallbackServer
methods.comment:
Gets the second highest priority server to join, or else the highest
 priority.

classes.name: ServerInfo
classes.comment: Class used to represent a server to connect to.

methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Get the name of this server.

methods.name: getAddress
methods.comment:
Gets the connectable host + port pair for this server. Implementations
 expect this to be used as the unique identifier per each instance of this
 class.

methods.name: getPlayers
methods.comment: Get the set of all players on this server.

methods.name: getMotd
methods.comment: Returns the MOTD which should be used when this server is a forced host.

methods.name: isRestricted
methods.comment:
Whether this server is restricted and therefore only players with the
 given permission can access it.

methods.name: getPermission
methods.comment:
Get the permission required to access this server. Only enforced when the
 server is restricted.

methods.name: canAccess
methods.comment:
Whether the player can access this server. It will only return false when
 the player has no permission and this server is restricted.

methods.name: sendData
methods.comment:
Send data by any available means to this server. This data may be queued
 and there is no guarantee of its timely arrival.

 In recent Minecraft versions channel names must contain a colon separator
 and consist of [a-z0-9/._-]. This will be enforced in a future version.
 The "BungeeCord" channel is an exception and may only take this form.

methods.name: sendData
methods.comment:
Send data by any available means to this server.

 In recent Minecraft versions channel names must contain a colon separator
 and consist of [a-z0-9/._-]. This will be enforced in a future version.
 The "BungeeCord" channel is an exception and may only take this form.

methods.name: ping
methods.comment: Asynchronously gets the current player count on this server.

classes.name: ServerConnectEvent
classes.comment:
Called when deciding to connect to a server. At the time when this event is
 called, no connection has actually been made. Cancelling the event will
 ensure that the connection does not proceed and can be useful to prevent
 certain players from accessing certain servers.

classes.name: PostLoginEvent
classes.comment:
Event called as soon as a connection has a {@link ProxiedPlayer} and is ready
 to be connected to a server.

classes.name: SettingsChangedEvent
classes.comment:
Called after a {@link ProxiedPlayer} changed one or more of the following (client-side) settings:
  • View distance
  • Locale
  • Displayed skin parts
  • Chat visibility
  • Chat colors
  • Main hand side (left or right)

classes.name: TabCompleteResponseEvent
classes.comment:
Event called when a backend server sends a response to a player asking to
 tab-complete a chat message or command. Note that this is not called when
 BungeeCord or a plugin responds to a tab-complete request. Use
 {@link TabCompleteEvent} for that.

classes.name: ProxyPingEvent
classes.comment: Called when the proxy is pinged with packet 0xFE from the server list.

classes.name: ChatEvent
classes.comment: Event called when a player sends a message to a server.

methods.name: isCommand
methods.comment: Checks whether this message is valid as a command

methods.name: isProxyCommand
methods.comment: Checks whether this message is run on this proxy server.

classes.name: TabCompleteEvent
classes.comment: Event called when a player uses tab completion.

classes.name: PlayerHandshakeEvent
classes.comment:
Event called to represent a player first making their presence and username
 known.

classes.name: PluginMessageEvent
classes.comment: Event called when a plugin message is sent to the client or server.

classes.name: ServerKickEvent
classes.comment: Represents a player getting kicked from a server.

classes.name: PermissionCheckEvent
classes.comment: Called when the permission of a CommandSender is checked.

classes.name: ServerConnectedEvent
classes.comment:
Not to be confused with {@link ServerConnectEvent}, this event is called once
 a connection to a server is fully operational, and is about to hand over
 control of the session to the player. It is useful if you wish to send
 information to the server before the player logs in.

classes.name: TargetedEvent
classes.comment: An event which occurs in the communication between two nodes.

classes.name: PlayerDisconnectEvent
classes.comment:
Called when a player has left the proxy, it is not safe to call any methods
 that perform an action on the passed player instance.

classes.name: PreLoginEvent
classes.comment:
Event called to represent a player first making their presence and username
 known.

 This will NOT contain many attributes relating to the player which are filled
 in after authentication with Mojang's servers. Examples of attributes which
 are not available include their UUID.

classes.name: ServerSwitchEvent
classes.comment: Called when a player has changed servers.

classes.name: ProxyReloadEvent
classes.comment: Called when somebody reloads BungeeCord

classes.name: AsyncEvent
classes.comment: Represents an event which depends on the result of asynchronous operations.

methods.name: registerIntent
methods.comment:
Register an intent that this plugin will continue to perform work on a
 background task, and wishes to let the event proceed once the registered
 background task has completed. Multiple intents can be registered by a
 plugin, but the plugin must complete the same amount of intents for the
 event to proceed.

methods.name: completeIntent
methods.comment:
Notifies this event that this plugin has completed an intent and wishes
 to let the event proceed once all intents have been completed.

classes.name: LoginEvent
classes.comment: Event called to represent a player logging in.
